TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IToolboxService

summary.span: 提供在开发环境下管理和查询工具箱的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties to manage and query the toolbox in the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供属性和方法添加和移除工具箱项和工具箱创建者的回调委托，序列化和反序列化工具箱项，并检索工具箱的状态信息和管理工具箱状态。The interface provides properties and methods for adding and removing toolbox items and toolbox creator callback delegates, serializing and deserializing toolbox items, and retrieving toolbox state information and managing toolbox state. 可以使用以下方法检索工具箱的内容的信息：You can retrieve information about the contents of the toolbox with the following methods: - 属性指示在工具箱上当前可用的类别。The property indicates the categories currently available on the toolbox. - 属性指示当前选定的工具箱类别。The property indicates the currently selected toolbox category. - 方法检索选择性筛选，按指定的工具箱类别的工具箱上的项。The method retrieves the items on the toolbox, optionally filtered by a specified toolbox category. - 方法检索当前所选。The method retrieves the currently selected . - 方法选择指定作为当前工具箱项。The method selects the specified as the current toolbox item. - 方法指示是否指定序列化对象，如果它是，支持指定的设计器宿主，或是否符合指定的特性。The method indicates whether the specified serialized object, if it is a , is supported by the specified designer host, or whether it matches the specified attributes. - 方法指示指定的序列化的对象是否为。The method indicates whether the specified serialized object is a . 您可以添加和使用以下方法删除工具箱项：You can add and remove toolbox items with the following methods: - 方法将添加到工具箱中，创建有选择地指定的类别 （如果不存在。The method adds a to the toolbox, creating the optionally specified category if it does not exist. - 方法将添加，仅在启用到工具箱当前项目。The method adds a that is only enabled for the current project to the toolbox. - 方法移除指定。The method removes the specified . - 方法将添加能够转换到工具箱上存储的数据的某些类型的委托。The method adds a delegate capable of converting some type of data stored on the toolbox to a . - 方法中删除任何指定的数据类型的委托。The method removes any delegates for the specified data type. 可以刷新工具箱、 工具箱将条目标记为使用，或将鼠标光标设置为一个游标，表示当前工具箱项使用以下方法：You can refresh the toolbox, mark a toolbox item as used, or set the mouse cursor to a cursor that represents the current toolbox item using the following methods: - 方法刷新以反映当前状态的工具箱项的工具箱中显示。The method refreshes the toolbox display to reflect the current state of the toolbox items. - 方法通知工具箱，已使用选定的工具箱项。The method signals the toolbox that the selected toolbox item has been used. - 方法将鼠标光标设置为表示当前工具箱项的游标。The method sets the mouse cursor to a cursor that represents the current toolbox item. 工具箱可用于序列化或反序列化工具箱项使用以下方法：You can use the toolbox to serialize or deserialize a toolbox item using the following methods: - 方法尝试返回从指定的序列化的工具箱项对象。The method attempts to return a from the specified serialized toolbox item object. - 方法返回表示指定的序列化的对象。The method returns a serialized object representing the specified . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将在设计模式下，可以列出和选择的工具箱类别和项，还可以从工具箱项创建组件或控件并将其添加到。The following code example demonstrates the use of the in design mode to list and select toolbox categories and items, and to create components or controls from toolbox items and add them to a . 若要使用的示例，代码编译为程序集，并在 Windows 窗体应用程序中添加对程序集的引用。To use the example, compile the code to an assembly, and add a reference to the assembly in a Windows Forms application. 如果使用的 Visual Studio`IToolboxServiceControl`自动添加到**工具箱**。If you are using Visual Studio, the `IToolboxServiceControl` is automatically added to the **Toolbox**. 创建的实例`IToolboxServiceControl`要测试其行为的窗体上。Create an instance of the `IToolboxServiceControl` on a form to test its behavior. [!code-cpp[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/CPP/itoolboxservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/CS/itoolboxservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/VB/itoolboxservicecontrol.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了使用的组件添加"文本"数据格式处理程序，或，到工具箱。The following code example provides a component that uses the to add a "Text" data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 粘贴到工具箱的数据和到自定义拖动到窗体上任何文本数据的数据创建者回调委托传递，创建包含的文本。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式添加新的工具箱项创建者。

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式添加新的工具箱项创建者。

span.span: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱项创建者可以将被粘贴或拖动到工具箱中的特定数据格式的数据转换。A toolbox item creator can convert data of a particular data format that has been pasted or dropped on the toolbox into a . 如果创建者要处理多个格式，则调用不止一次。If a creator handles more than one format, call more than once. 如果添加多个相同的格式创建者，可能会导致意外的行为。Unexpected behavior may result if you add more than one creator for the same format.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddCreator (System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback creator, string format, System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host);

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式和设计器宿主添加新的工具箱项创建者。

span.span: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format and designer host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱项创建者可以将被粘贴或拖动到工具箱中的特定数据格式的数据转换。A toolbox item creator can convert data of a particular data format that has been pasted or dropped on the toolbox into a . 如果创建者要处理多个格式，则调用不止一次。If a creator handles more than one format, call more than once. 如果添加多个相同的格式创建者，可能会导致意外的行为。Unexpected behavior may result if you add more than one creator for the same format. 如果`host`参数设置为`null`，创建者将可供所有设计器。If the `host` parameter is set to `null`, the creator will be available to all designers. 如果提供设计器宿主，则创建者将仅可供设计器使用指定的主机。If a designer host is supplied, the creator will only be available to designers using the specified host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 刷新工具箱项的状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the toolbox items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于向工具箱服务指示用户想要更新的工具箱项的缓存。The method is used to indicate to the toolbox service that the user wants to update the cache of toolbox items. 如果工具箱服务维护一个实时的工具箱项容器列表，然后此方法将执行任何操作。If the toolbox service maintains a live list of toolbox item containers, then this method will do nothing. 如果它要维护的工具箱项容器的快照，则调用此方法应确保快照是最新。If it maintains a snapshot of toolbox item containers, calling this method should ensure that the snapshot is up to date.
